glyrepr 0.1.0.9010

glyrepr

This package is a wrapper of ‘igraph’ for representing glycan structures in R. It provides a set of functions to create and manipulate glycan structures, and to visualize them in a graph format.

Installation

You can install the development version of glyrepr from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("fubin1999/glyrepr")

Example 

library(glyrepr)

glycan <- n_glycan_core()
print(glycan, verbose = TRUE)
#> Glycan Graph (NE)
#> GlcNAc: 2, Man: 3
#> ------------------
#> GlcNAc (?1-)
#> └─GlcNAc (b1-4)
#>   └─Man (b1-4)
#>     ├─Man (a1-3)
#>     └─Man (a1-6)
